titles.title: Duty Drawback Clarification Ac
Duty Drawback Clarification Ac
To clarify the treatment of drawback on distilled spirits, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Duty Drawback Clarification Act
This bill provides for drawback (refund of certain duties, taxes, and fees) on whiskies imported into the United States when the same or similar products are later exported or destroyed. Further, the bill prohibits a proprietor of a distilled spirits plant from voluntarily destroying distilled spirits as a basis for claiming a drawback.
